Package com.chatapp.services

Class ChatRoomManager

java.lang.Object
com.chatapp.services.ChatRoomManager
public class ChatRoomManager extends Object
Manages the lifecycle and operations of chat rooms within the application. The ChatRoomManager offers methods for overseeing chat room participants, tracking chat messages, and maintaining the active chat room for a user session.

This manager integrates closely with the database, ensuring persistence of chat rooms and user-chat room relationships. It also provides an atomic counter to produce unique identifiers for chat rooms, ensuring thread safety.

Author:
Prutha Upadhyay

  • Method Details

    • getCurrentChatRoom

      public ChatRoom getCurrentChatRoom()
      Retrieves the currently active chat room for the session.
      Returns:
      The currently active chat room.

    • setCurrentChatRoom

      public void setCurrentChatRoom(ChatRoom currentChatRoom)
      Sets the currently active chat room for the session.
      Parameters:
      currentChatRoom - The chat room to be set as currently active.

    • getChatRooms

      public List<ChatRoom> getChatRooms()
      Retrieves a list of all chat rooms in the system.
      Returns:
      A list of all chat rooms.

    • generateChatRoomId

      public int generateChatRoomId()
      Generates a unique ID for a chat room. This ID is used as an identifier for chat rooms in the system.
      Returns:
      A unique chat room ID.

    • addParticipantToChatRoom

      public void addParticipantToChatRoom(RegisterUser user, ChatRoom chatRoom)
      Adds a registered user to a specified chat room. This method not only updates the in-memory representation of the chat room but also persists the user-chat room association to the database.
      Parameters:
      user - The registered user intended to join the chat room.
      chatRoom - The target chat room.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if either the user or chat room is null.

    • removeParticipantFromChatRoom

      public void removeParticipantFromChatRoom(RegisterUser user, ChatRoom chatRoom)
      Excludes a registered user from a specific chat room. This operation will also update the database, removing the user-chat room association.
      Parameters:
      user - The registered user intended to exit the chat room.
      chatRoom - The target chat room.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if either the user or chat room is null.

    • storeChatMessage

      public void storeChatMessage(ChatRoom chatRoom, String message)
      Captures and stores a chat message within a designated chat room. This ensures that each message sent within the room is kept in its historical context.
      Parameters:
      chatRoom - The chat room where the message originates and will be stored.
      message - The chat message content.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the chat room is null or if the message is null/empty.
